name: LaMetric
0:
”Alexa, turn on the SKY.”
”Alexa, change the brightness on SKY to 70%.”
”Alexa, turn on clock on TIME.”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Create a special atmosphere in your home and get important information at a glance with ease!

This integration enables you to control your smart devices with voice commands.

Interact with the SKY by turning it on/off, changing the brightness, setting the color, changing the light effects/apps and working mode. Interact with the TIME by changing apps, controlling the radio, or managing the volume.

Just connect your LaMetric smart device to Wi-Fi, link Alexa to your LaMetric account by entering login and password and you are all set!

For additional support, please contact support@lametric.com
